entry.title: Thursday: Rain or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early this morning. Rain beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning and developing this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 near noon. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 05 May 2016
